newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Burnham growth cited.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Burnham growth cited.

text.p: -- Morgan Stanley analyst Andrew Jones said he initiated coverage of Burnham Pacific Properties Inc with a strong buy rating, citing growth opportunities.
-- estimated funds from operations of $1.27 per share for 1997 and $1.44 for 1998.
-- set 12-month price target of $15. Shares rose 3/8 to 13-1/8.
-- real estate investment trust owns stakes in 29 retail properties, and four office properties, all in California.
-- Jones cited opportunities on the West Coast, where "retail is very fragmented, and right now there's a period where rents and occupancies are going up...and prices are attactive.
-- said the REIT has "the right set of people and other infrastructure to acquire assets and then integrate them into their operations."
